about_the_game:
The day lightspeed travel was invented, its inventor uttered the words "Prepare for assimilation, declare your servitude." Soon, these words became the mark of an oncoming nightmare. No one knows Epsilon, but wars were fought in their name. And they won, a certainty when one controls the stellar resource.

The society is divided. Any resistance is promptly crushed like a dried leaf under the boot. Fear is the regime's best weapon... but not all are born to oblige.

Play as a group of insurgents with quirky personalities, skills, and motivations. They might be different but share a common goal, Death to the Regime!

First, they must discover who or what Epsilon is and where to find them. Plow through Epsilon forces to achieve your objectives in Turn-based Tactical gameplay. But beware of deceptions because everything can be bought for the right price.

TURN-BASED TACTICS GAMEPLAY

If you have a turn-based tactics itch, Epsilon Protocol is the perfect game to scratch it.

CONTROL A TEAM OF QUIRKY INSURGENTS

They may not agree on everything and have different motivations. However, this group has a common goal and must use their unique abilities in unison to achieve it.

STRAIGHT OUTTA COMIC BOOK

Enter a world with a unique visual style. Dive into a comic book with stylized visuals and over-the-top storytelling elements.

BE SNEAKY OR GO GUNS BLAZING

Every objective can be achieved in multiple ways. It's up to you to decide your approach. Position your team to sneakily take out multiple targets at once or shake their souls with a bullet barrage

content_descriptors.notes: The game involves killing enemy soldiers using weapons and abilities.
